europeana:record.dc:title: Revisional notes on Coladenia Moore, 1881 (Lepidoptera: Hesperiidae)
Zoologische Mededelingen
europeana:record.dc:creator: Jong, de R.
Treadaway C.G.
europeana:record.dc:subject: Insecta
Lepidoptera; Hesperiidae; Coladenia; revision; Oriental Region
europeana:record.dc:description: The species of Coladenia Moore, 1881, occurring in the Philippines are revised. The following species are shown to occur there: C. igna (Semper, 1892), C. semperi Elwes & Edwards, 1897, C. minor Chiba et al., 1991, and C. palawana (Staudinger, 1889). Two new species are added: C. ochracea and C. similis, and the new subspecies of C. igna marinda, is described. Due to the incorrect identification of the Sundaland form of C. agni (de Niceville, 1883) as the Philippine C. igna by Evans (1949), the former was still unnamed; it is named C. agni sundae here.
europeana:record.dcterms:isPartOf: Revisional notes on Coladenia Moore, 1881 (Lepidoptera: Hesperiidae) (URN:ISSN:0024-0672) (Volume 66) (Issue 15)
